parameters.name: ConnectionStringPrefix
parameters.description:
The prefix of the custom endpoint.

*   The prefix can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-) and must start with a lowercase letter.
*   The prefix can be up to 30 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~2361776~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.
